about.description:
hop-client is a client library to publish and subscribe messages to
HOPSKOTCH, a scalable, high-throughput low-latency platform for handling
real-time data feeds for MMA applications.
about.summary: A pub-sub client library for Multimessenger Astrophysics

about.description:
hop-client is a client library to publish and subscribe messages to
HOPSKOTCH, a scalable, high-throughput low-latency platform for handling
real-time data feeds for MMA applications.
about.summary: A pub-sub client library for Multimessenger Astrophysics

name: hop-client

new_version_errors.0.6.0:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '0.6.0' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/hop-client-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "hop-client" %}
{% set version = "0.5.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "f10c8be1de6f5cbd0b5cfd1ef549b5f789c6bb221e8803cc4413bf811792089a" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/hop-client-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - hop = hop.__main__:main

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
    - setuptools-scm
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - adc-streaming >=2.0.0
    - dataclasses
    - pluggy >=0.11
    - toml >=0.9.4
    - xmltodict >=0.9.0

test:
  requires:
    - pytest >=5.0
    - pytest-console-scripts
    - setuptools
  source_files:
    - tests
  commands:
    - python -m pytest tests

about:
  home: https://github.com/scimma/hop-client
  doc_url: https://hop-client.readthedocs.io
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A pub-sub client library for Multimessenger Astrophysics
  description: |
    hop-client is a client library to publish and subscribe messages to
    HOPSKOTCH, a scalable, high-throughput low-latency platform for handling
    real-time data feeds for MMA applications.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bfc5288
    - myNameIsPatrick
